General Bales has just returned."},{"lineNumber":25384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パラパラ砦周辺の魔軍の掃討が完了したそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems the extermination of the demon army around the Parapara Fort has been completed.\""},{"lineNumber":25385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ。労っておいて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see. There might still be some stray ones…"},

I can't think about that...)"},{"lineNumber":25403,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あの男がもしいたら、こんな騒ぎでは","translatedEnglishLine":"(If that man were here, this would not have ended in just a ruckus,"},{"lineNumber":25404,"originalJapaneseLine":"　済まなかったかもしれないな……）","translatedEnglishLine":"it might have been something much worse...)"},{"lineNumber":25405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぅ。やっと一段落、かな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew. Finally, a breather, I guess.\""},{"lineNumber":25406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ。終わったわけではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. It’s not over yet."},{"lineNumber":25407,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、大きな勝利です」","translatedEnglishLine":"But it is a great victory.\""},{"lineNumber":25408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヨシフ戦では、お疲れ様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good job during the Yosif battle."},{"lineNumber":25409,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やはりああいう局面は、君でないとね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed, in that kind of situation, it had to be you."},{"lineNumber":25410,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が軍は、ここぞの時の攻め駒が少ないから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Our army has few attacking pieces for crucial moments.\""},{"lineNumber":25411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ。それを言うのなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, if you say that,"},{"lineNumber":25412,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エクス将軍こそ、見事な作戦でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"General Ex was the one with the brilliant strategy.\""},{"lineNumber":25413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう大したものではないよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's nothing that special."},{"lineNumber":25414,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヨシフの動向を、徹底的に探らせていただけさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just thoroughly investigated Yosif's movements.\""},{"lineNumber":25415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした、スーよ。浮かない顔じゃな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong, Sue? You look unhappy.\""},{"lineNumber":25416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お父様……いえ、そういう訳では……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father... no, it's not that..."},{"lineNumber":25417,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ少し、エクス将軍の事で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just that I'm a little concerned about General Ex...\""},{"lineNumber":25418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ふむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".......Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":25419,"originalJapaneseLine":"スーが声を低めたのに合わせ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Matching Sue's lowered voice,"},{"lineNumber":25420,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスも軽く周囲を見渡した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Bales also glanced lightly around."},{"lineNumber":25421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア様の所在地の情報を流して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Leaking information about Lady Ria's whereabouts,"},{"lineNumber":25422,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の動きを釣る……それも、","translatedEnglishLine":"to bait the demon army's movements... and also,"},{"lineNumber":25423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア様には無断で、内密に…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"all done secretly without Lady Ria's knowledge...\""},{"lineNumber":25424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの手紙によれば、赤の軍の攻勢にも加減をさせ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"According to that letter, the aggression of the Red Army was also restrained,"},{"lineNumber":25425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　被害を抑えて……向こうに選択の余地を与えたと」","translatedEnglishLine":"damage was minimized...allowing the enemy some choice.\""},{"lineNumber":25426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":25427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「上手くはいきましたけど、いちかばちかでした。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It went well, but it was a gamble."},{"lineNumber":25428,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし、ヨシフが本気でリア様を狙って","translatedEnglishLine":"If Yosif had seriously targeted Lady Ria"},{"lineNumber":25429,"originalJapaneseLine":"　突撃してきたら、どうなっていたか分かりません」","translatedEnglishLine":"and charged, who knows what would have happened.\""},{"lineNumber":25430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ奴は直属の部隊で情報を徹底して収集し、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That guy thoroughly gathered information with his direct unit,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 限界を超えても強引に維持していた魔軍の士気が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The morale of the demon army, which had been forcibly maintained beyond its limits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時、完全に崩壊した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: completely collapsed at this moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおおおおおお！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O, oooooooo!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃！　攻め落とせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge! Overwhelm them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「動ける奴、私と来い！　南国軍の恐ろしさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who can move, come with me! I'll show you the terror of the Southern Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄の底まで叩き込んでやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll drive it into the very depths of hell!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこから先は、既に戦ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, it was no longer a battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背中を見せて逃走する魔軍を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army turning their backs and fleeing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱して立ち尽くす魔軍を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army standing bewildered in confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は散々に打ちのめした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Leesas Army thoroughly beat them down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の、勝利だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a victory for the Leesas Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様。先ほど、バレス将軍が帰還いたしました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Ria. General Bales has just returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パラパラ砦周辺の魔軍の掃討が完了したそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the extermination of the demon army around the Parapara Fort has been completed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ。労っておいて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see. Be sure to commend him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。……ヨシフ打倒と合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. …Along with defeating Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで国内の魔軍勢力はほぼ片付きましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army forces within the country are almost cleared out now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうね。まだ野良化した連中はいるかもだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. There might still be some stray ones…

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一旦は、これで終わりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But for now, this ends it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは軽く溜息を漏らし、窓の外へと目をやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria lightly sighed and looked out the window.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝利に、っ……かんぱーーーーーい！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To victory...—cheers!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わはははは、何度目の乾杯だよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahahahaha, how many times have we toasted now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何回したっていいんだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It doesn't matter how many times we do it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの、人類の勝ちだーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas', humanity's victoryーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街には既にリーザス軍の戦勝が伝えられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The news of the Leesas Army's victory had already spread through the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一角を開放しての宴会が繰り広げられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a banquet was being held in an open area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな、お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, good work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日に響かないように、たっぷり楽しんでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enjoy yourselves plenty so it doesn't affect tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ……規律も何も、あったものではないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief... there's no discipline or anything left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日くらいは、というのは分かるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand it's just for today though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （はぁ……ここにランスもいたら……って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Haa... if only Rance were here... but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だめだめ。そんな事、考えちゃ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no. I can't think about that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あの男がもしいたら、こんな騒ぎでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If that man were here, this would not have ended in just a ruckus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 済まなかったかもしれないな……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might have been something much worse...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅ。やっと一段落、かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew. Finally, a breather, I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ。終わったわけではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. It’s not over yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、大きな勝利です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it is a great victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヨシフ戦では、お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job during the Yosif battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはりああいう局面は、君でないとね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, in that kind of situation, it had to be you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍は、ここぞの時の攻め駒が少ないから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our army has few attacking pieces for crucial moments."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。それを言うのなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, if you say that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍こそ、見事な作戦でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex was the one with the brilliant strategy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう大したものではないよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's nothing that special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの動向を、徹底的に探らせていただけさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just thoroughly investigated Yosif's movements."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした、スーよ。浮かない顔じゃな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, Sue? You look unhappy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父様……いえ、そういう訳では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Father... no, it's not that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ少し、エクス将軍の事で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just that I'm a little concerned about General Ex..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが声を低めたのに合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Matching Sue's lowered voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスも軽く周囲を見渡した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bales also glanced lightly around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様の所在地の情報を流して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Leaking information about Lady Ria's whereabouts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の動きを釣る……それも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to bait the demon army's movements... and also,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様には無断で、内密に…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all done secretly without Lady Ria's knowledge..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの手紙によれば、赤の軍の攻勢にも加減をさせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to that letter, the aggression of the Red Army was also restrained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害を抑えて……向こうに選択の余地を与えたと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: damage was minimized...allowing the enemy some choice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手くはいきましたけど、いちかばちかでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It went well, but it was a gamble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし、ヨシフが本気でリア様を狙って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yosif had seriously targeted Lady Ria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃してきたら、どうなっていたか分かりません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged, who knows what would have happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あ奴は直属の部隊で情報を徹底して収集し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That guy thoroughly gathered information with his direct unit,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

Ria"},{"lineNumber":25429,"originalJapaneseLine":"　突撃してきたら、どうなっていたか分かりません」","translatedEnglishLine":"and charged, who knows what would have translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 限界を超えても強引に維持していた魔軍の士気が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The morale of the demon army, which had been forcibly maintained beyond its limits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この時、完全に崩壊した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: completely collapsed at this moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおおおおおお！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O, oooooooo!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃！　攻め落とせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge! Overwhelm them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「動ける奴、私と来い！　南国軍の恐ろしさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who can move, come with me! I'll show you the terror of the Southern Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄の底まで叩き込んでやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll drive it into the very depths of hell!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこから先は、既に戦ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From then on, it was no longer a battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背中を見せて逃走する魔軍を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army turning their backs and fleeing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱して立ち尽くす魔軍を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army standing bewildered in confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は散々に打ちのめした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Leesas Army thoroughly beat them down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍の、勝利だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a victory for the Leesas Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様。先ほど、バレス将軍が帰還いたしました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Ria. General Bales has just returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パラパラ砦周辺の魔軍の掃討が完了したそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the extermination of the demon army around the Parapara Fort has been completed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ。労っておいて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see. Be sure to commend him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。……ヨシフ打倒と合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. …Along with defeating Yosif,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで国内の魔軍勢力はほぼ片付きましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army forces within the country are almost cleared out now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうね。まだ野良化した連中はいるかもだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. There might still be some stray ones…

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一旦は、これで終わりね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But for now, this ends it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは軽く溜息を漏らし、窓の外へと目をやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria lightly sighed and looked out the window.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝利に、っ……かんぱーーーーーい！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To victory...—cheers!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わはははは、何度目の乾杯だよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahahahaha, how many times have we toasted now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何回したっていいんだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It doesn't matter how many times we do it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの、人類の勝ちだーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas', humanity's victoryーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街には既にリーザス軍の戦勝が伝えられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The news of the Leesas Army's victory had already spread through the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一角を開放しての宴会が繰り広げられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a banquet was being held in an open area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「みんな、お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, good work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日に響かないように、たっぷり楽しんでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enjoy yourselves plenty so it doesn't affect tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ……規律も何も、あったものではないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief... there's no discipline or anything left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日くらいは、というのは分かるが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand it's just for today though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （はぁ……ここにランスもいたら……って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Haa... if only Rance were here... but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だめだめ。そんな事、考えちゃ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no. I can't think about that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あの男がもしいたら、こんな騒ぎでは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If that man were here, this would not have ended in just a ruckus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 済まなかったかもしれないな……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might have been something much worse...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふぅ。やっと一段落、かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew. Finally, a breather, I guess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ。終わったわけではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. It’s not over yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、大きな勝利です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it is a great victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヨシフ戦では、お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good job during the Yosif battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはりああいう局面は、君でないとね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, in that kind of situation, it had to be you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が軍は、ここぞの時の攻め駒が少ないから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our army has few attacking pieces for crucial moments."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。それを言うのなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, if you say that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクス将軍こそ、見事な作戦でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Ex was the one with the brilliant strategy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう大したものではないよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's nothing that special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフの動向を、徹底的に探らせていただけさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just thoroughly investigated Yosif's movements."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした、スーよ。浮かない顔じゃな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, Sue? You look unhappy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父様……いえ、そういう訳では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Father... no, it's not that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ少し、エクス将軍の事で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just that I'm a little concerned about General Ex..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーが声を低めたのに合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Matching Sue's lowered voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスも軽く周囲を見渡した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bales also glanced lightly around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様の所在地の情報を流して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Leaking information about Lady Ria's whereabouts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の動きを釣る……それも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to bait the demon army's movements... and also,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様には無断で、内密に…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all done secretly without Lady Ria's knowledge..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの手紙によれば、赤の軍の攻勢にも加減をさせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to that letter, the aggression of the Red Army was also restrained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害を抑えて……向こうに選択の余地を与えたと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: damage was minimized...allowing the enemy some choice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手くはいきましたけど、いちかばちかでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It went well, but it was a gamble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし、ヨシフが本気でリア様を狙って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yosif had seriously targeted Lady Ria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突撃してきたら、どうなっていたか分かりません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged, who knows what would have happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あ奴は直属の部隊で情報を徹底して収集し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That guy thoroughly gathered information with his direct unit,
